Um what's DoT? I played him when he was free and I didn't like him.

Damage over Time. His Q you lay it down in an area, and it applies a Damage over Time laser effect, Swain's E applies a Damage over Time + damage amplifier (20% damage from all damage coming from swain), and his ult sends out ravens that do minimal damage, but quickly, so another Damage over Time.
Bard and Aurelion sol are both easy to mess up, but really fun to play.
